brand_identity.name: Odyssey
brand_identity.tagline: The Art of Getting Lost, Curated by AI.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix editorial travel magazine aesthetics with SaaS precision.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like the start of a journey.
Content is King: Destinations are the heroes; UI is the frame.
Zoom In: Use macro textures of maps, passports, and luggage tags.
Negative Space: Luxury is defined by what you leave out.

heading.usage: All H1-H3 headings, hero titles, and editorial quotes.

body.usage: UI elements, paragraphs, inputs, and data displays.

rules: Overlines must be UPPERCASE, text-xs, and tracking-widest.
Use font-light (300) for large display text to feel elegant.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black hover:bg-[#E5C568] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300

cards.glass: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-xl hover:border-white/20 transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border-white/10 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 focus:border-[#D4AF37]/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#D4AF37]/50 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 transition-all

navigation.header: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-[#050505]/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/5
navigation.sidebar: fixed left-0 h-full w-64 bg-[#0A0A0A] border-r border-white/5

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very subtle gold shimmer.
Avoid 'Inter' font for headings. Use 'Playfair Display'.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Dark mode is mandatory. Do not create a light mode toggle unless requested.
All interactive elements must have a hover state.
All interactive elements must include data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building 'Odyssey', a premium AI travel planner. Your goal is to make it feel like a high-end travel magazine that happens to be a functional app. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and placeholders. Implement the 'Jewel & Luxury' color palette strictly. Use the 'Tetris' grid for the landing page destination showcase. For the dashboard, use the 'High Density' grid but keep it breathable with padding.
